raw_response:
```json
[
  {"entry_number": 1, "date": "2025-06-10", "content": "Another slow Tuesday. Bills are piling up faster than customers. Just checked the bank balance again. Feeling sick to my stomach about how we'll make rent next month."},
  {"entry_number": 2, "date": "2025-06-13", "content": "Had a tense dinner with Mark last night. He says I'm always distracted. He's right, but how can I not be? The restaurant is everything right now. Felt distant."},
  {"entry_number": 3, "date": "2025-06-16", "content": "My first therapy session today. Talked about the restaurant, the constant worry. It felt good to just say it all out loud, though nothing is "fixed." Still feeling the pressure."},
  {"entry_number": 4, "date": "2025-06-18", "content": "New supplier raised prices again. Had to cut some specials. This margin is getting razor-thin. Feel like I'm constantly putting out fires instead of running a business."},
  {"entry_number": 5, "date": "2025-06-21", "content": "Small win today, a good Friday night crowd. Best in weeks. Felt a tiny bit of hope. Maybe we can turn this around. Mark even smiled a little."},
  {"entry_number": 6, "date": "2025-06-24", "content": "That hope didn't last. Saturday was decent, Sunday was dead. Back to square one with the finances. Mark barely spoke this morning. My stomach hurts."},
  {"entry_number": 7, "date": "2025-06-27", "content": "Another therapy session. Dr. M suggests focusing on what I can control. Easier said than done when everything feels out of reach. Still struggling with the fear of failure."},
  {"entry_number": 8, "date": "2025-06-30", "content": "Reviewed the books. We're bleeding money slowly. The thought of losing this place, everything I've built, is terrifying. Don't know how much more I can take."},
  {"entry_number": 9, "date": "2025-07-02", "content": "Mark and I argued about money again. He thinks I'm too optimistic, then too pessimistic. It’s hard to talk to him when he doesn't understand the daily struggle."},
  {"entry_number": 10, "date": "2025-07-05", "content": "Tried a new marketing flyer today. Feels like a drop in the ocean. Just exhausted from constantly trying to push this rock uphill. Wondering if it's worth it."},
  {"entry_number": 11, "date": "2025-07-08", "content": "A quieter day. Managed to get some paperwork done. The quiet used to be good, now it just reminds me of empty tables. It's a constant battle inside my head."},
  {"entry_number": 12, "date": "2025-07-11", "content": "Therapy session. Talked about my identity being tied to the restaurant. If it fails, who am I? It’s a huge weight, trying to separate that feeling."},
  {"entry_number": 13, "date": "2025-07-14", "content": "Ordered new ingredients. Every purchase feels like a gamble now. Just trying to keep quality up, but every penny counts. It's a constant tightrope walk."},
  {"entry_number": 14, "date": "2025-07-16", "content": "Mark suggested we cut back on personal expenses. Fair point, but it felt like an attack. He just doesn't get the scale of the problem. Felt alone again."},
  {"entry_number": 15, "date": "2025-07-19", "content": "Had a small unexpected catering order today. A tiny boost in revenue. It's not much, but it helped lift my spirits slightly. Maybe there's still a chance."},
  {"entry_number": 16, "date": "2025-07-22", "content": "Another slow weekday. Sat staring at the empty chairs for too long. This fear of failure is a knot in my stomach. Just trying to get through the day."},
  {"entry_number": 17, "date": "2025-07-25", "content": "Therapy today. Dr. M wants me to focus on self-care, even small things. Hard to think about that when the business needs me constantly. Felt a bit overwhelmed."},
  {"entry_number": 18, "date": "2025-07-28", "content": "Caught myself snapping at an employee today. Felt terrible afterwards. The stress is making me short-tempered. I need to manage this better, for everyone's sake."},
  {"entry_number": 19, "date": "2025-07-31", "content": "Talked to a business consultant friend. He gave some ideas, but it all requires capital we don't have. It's discouraging, feels like I'm hitting a wall."},
  {"entry_number": 20, "date": "2025-08-02", "content": "Mark and I went for a walk. We didn't talk about the restaurant. It was nice, a brief respite. Still, the underlying tension is always there, unspoken."},
  {"entry_number": 21, "date": "2025-08-05", "content": "A big utility bill came in. Higher than expected. How do these things always happen at the worst possible time? Just makes the financial stress worse."},
  {"entry_number": 22, "date": "2025-08-08", "content": "Therapy session. Discussed coping strategies for panic attacks. I haven't had a full one, but the anxiety is constant. Trying to breathe through it all."},
  {"entry_number": 23, "date": "2025-08-11", "content": "Managed to get a small loan from my brother-in-law. It's temporary relief, but it feels like a band-aid. Grateful, but also more pressure not to fail."},
  {"entry_number": 24, "date": "2025-08-14", "content": "Tried a new special on the menu tonight. It sold out! A small victory, but it felt huge. Maybe this is a sign of things improving. Felt a glimmer of joy."},
  {"entry_number": 25, "date": "2025-08-16", "content": "Still buzzing from the special's success. Even Mark seemed genuinely pleased. It's good to share a positive moment. Perhaps communication isn't completely broken."},
  {"entry_number": 26, "date": "2025-08-19", "content": "Back to reality. Weekend was okay, but not enough to cover last month's losses. The financial hole feels so deep. It's hard to stay motivated sometimes."},
  {"entry_number": 27, "date": "2025-08-22", "content": "Therapy today. We talked about celebrating small wins, even when the big picture is uncertain. It's hard, but I'm trying to acknowledge the positive moments more."},
  {"entry_number": 28, "date": "2025-08-25", "content": "A customer left a great review online today. That felt really good. It's nice to know people appreciate the food and effort. A needed reminder."},
  {"entry_number": 29, "date": "2025-08-27", "content": "Mark and I had an honest talk, no shouting. He admitted he's stressed too. It's not just me. That somehow made me feel a little less alone in this mess."},
  {"entry_number": 30, "date": "2025-08-30", "content": "Worked late on inventory. Found a few ways to reduce waste. It’s small, but every saving helps. Trying to be practical and proactive, rather than just worrying."},
  {"entry_number": 31, "date": "2025-09-02", "content": "September is here. Had a slightly better week overall. Still tight, but not spiraling. Holding onto hope that this positive trend continues for the restaurant."},
  {"entry_number": 32, "date": "2025-09-05", "content": "Therapy session. Dr. M said I sound a bit less anxious. I guess I do feel a slight shift. Still worried, but maybe I'm learning to manage it better now."},
  {"entry_number": 33, "date": "2025-09-08", "content": "Called an old friend today, someone not connected to the restaurant. It was good to just talk about other things. A reminder there's life outside this place."},
  {"entry_number": 34, "date": "2025-09-11", "content": "A major equipment repair bill came in. Just when I thought we were getting ahead. Feels like one step forward, two steps back. So frustrating and disheartening."},
  {"entry_number": 35, "date": "2025-09-14", "content": "Mark brought home flowers today. A surprise. It was a sweet gesture. Maybe we are finding our way back to each other, slowly. It gave me a lift."},
  {"entry_number": 36, "date": "2025-09-17", "content": "Another slow lunch service. The fear of failure still lingers, even with small moments of hope. It's a constant battle to stay positive and focused."},
  {"entry_number": 37, "date": "2025-09-20", "content": "Therapy session helped me reframe some negative thoughts. I'm trying to acknowledge small successes, even when the big picture is daunting. It's a process, I guess."},
  {"entry_number": 38, "date": "2025-09-23", "content": "Worked on a new autumn menu. Trying to use seasonal, cheaper ingredients to save costs. It feels good to be creative again, instead of just worried."},
  {"entry_number": 39, "date": "2025-09-26", "content": "Had a really busy Friday night! Best in months. The whole team was buzzing. It was exhausting but exhilarating. These nights remind me why I do this."},
  {"entry_number": 40, "date": "2025-09-29", "content": "That good Friday lifted my spirits. The financials for the week look better. Not out of the woods, but a significant improvement. I can breathe a little easier."},
  {"entry_number": 41, "date": "2025-10-01", "content": "Mark and I actually laughed tonight. A genuine, easy laugh. It felt like old times, even just for a moment. Hope we can have more of those soon."},
  {"entry_number": 42, "date": "2025-10-04", "content": "Therapy today. Discussed balancing work and personal life. It's still a struggle, but I'm trying to set boundaries. Hard when your passion is also your problem."},
  {"entry_number": 43, "date": "2025-10-07", "content": "Got a good deal on some produce today. Every little bit helps the bottom line. It feels good to make smart, practical decisions that actually save money."},
  {"entry_number": 44, "date": "2025-10-10", "content": "A few customers cancelled their reservations last minute. Annoying, but not a disaster. Just a reminder that things are still unpredictable. Stay calm, Jamie."},
  {"entry_number": 45, "date": "2025-10-13", "content": "Mark and I tried a new recipe together at home, just for fun. It was messy but enjoyable. Felt like a real connection, something we've missed for ages."},
  {"entry_number": 46, "date": "2025-10-16", "content": "The cooler broke down. Ugh. More unexpected expenses. This is why I can't relax. Every time I think we're okay, something else hits. It's exhausting."},
  {"entry_number": 47, "date": "2025-10-19", "content": "Therapy session. Talked about accepting that setbacks happen and they don't mean total failure. Trying to view the cooler as a problem to solve, not a catastrophe."},
  {"entry_number": 48, "date": "2025-10-22", "content": "Got a good quote for the cooler repair. Not cheap, but manageable. Feeling slightly less frantic. It's all about navigating these challenges, I suppose."},
  {"entry_number": 49, "date": "2025-10-25", "content": "Halloween weekend bookings are looking good! Finally, some strong numbers. A busy weekend would make a real difference to the bank account. Feeling a bit optimistic."},
  {"entry_number": 50, "date": "2025-10-28", "content": "The weekend was great! Best in six months. The energy in the restaurant was fantastic. So much relief. I actually slept well last night, for once."},
  {"entry_number": 51, "date": "2025-10-31", "content": "Mark and I went out for dinner, just us. Talked about how far we've come, how tough it's been. It felt good to acknowledge it together. We're a team."},
  {"entry_number": 52, "date": "2025-11-03", "content": "Therapy today. Dr. M noted my improved mood. It’s true, I feel lighter. Still aware of the challenges, but less consumed by the fear. Progress feels real."},
  {"entry_number": 53, "date": "2025-11-06", "content": "Started researching holiday catering options. Trying to be proactive for the festive season. Feels good to plan for growth, not just survival. Hopeful."},
  {"entry_number": 54, "date": "2025-11-09", "content": "Had a small disagreement with an employee about scheduling. Dealt with it calmly, which is a win for me. Stress used to make me react poorly."},
  {"entry_number": 55, "date": "2025-11-12", "content": "The restaurant next door closed down. Sad to see. A stark reminder of how fragile this business is. My fear of failure always lurks, even on good days."},
  {"entry_number": 56, "date": "2025-11-15", "content": "Mark suggested we take a short weekend trip after the holidays. The idea of a real break feels incredible. A sign that things are looking up, for us."},
  {"entry_number": 57, "date": "2025-11-18", "content": "Therapy session. Talked about sustained positivity and not letting past fears dictate future actions. It’s a challenge to stay in the present, but I'm trying."},
  {"entry_number": 58, "date": "2025-11-21", "content": "Thanksgiving week bookings are strong! This could be a really good month for the restaurant. Feeling genuinely excited, not just anxious hope. Good for the finances."},
  {"entry_number": 59, "date": "2025-11-24", "content": "Had a full house for lunch today. The kitchen was humming. It's hard work, but seeing happy customers makes it all worthwhile. A really good day."},
  {"entry_number": 60, "date": "2025-11-27", "content": "Mark helped me with some inventory after his work. It was nice to have him around, working together. Our marriage feels stronger when we collaborate."},
  {"entry_number": 61, "date": "2025-11-30", "content": "December is around the corner. We're looking at a profitable month, finally. It feels like a huge weight lifted. Still careful, but less suffocated by worry."},
  {"entry_number": 62, "date": "2025-12-03", "content": "Therapy session. Focused on maintaining balance as things improve. Don't want to fall back into old patterns of overwork. The goal is sustainable success and well-being."},
  {"entry_number": 63, "date": "2025-12-06", "content": "Had a lovely evening with Mark, just watching a movie. No talk of the restaurant, no stress. It's amazing how much clearer my head feels when I'm not consumed."},
  {"entry_number": 64, "date": "2025-12-09", "content": "Ordered extra supplies for the holiday rush. It's a big investment, but I feel confident it will pay off. Taking calculated risks now, not just desperate ones."},
  {"entry_number": 65, "date": "2025-12-12", "content": "The holiday decorations are up! The restaurant looks festive and inviting. It's a small detail, but it makes me happy. And hopefully, attracts more customers."},
  {"entry_number": 66, "date": "2025-12-15", "content": "A busy week. Exhausted but satisfied. Seeing the restaurant thriving, even for a season, is incredibly rewarding. The fear of failure still exists, but it's quieter now."},
  {"entry_number": 67, "date": "2025-12-18", "content": "Therapy today. Reflected on the year. It's been incredibly tough, but I've also grown. I'm learning to be kinder to myself, even when things go wrong."},
  {"entry_number": 68, "date": "2025-12-21", "content": "Mark and I exchanged gifts early. He got me a beautiful journal. He said he sees me trying. That meant more than the gift itself. My heart feels full."},
  {"entry_number": 69, "date": "2025-12-24", "content": "Christmas Eve dinner was fully booked! So grateful for our amazing team and loyal customers. Feeling a sense of accomplishment and genuine peace tonight."},
  {"entry_number": 70, "date": "2025-12-27", "content": "Took a much-needed day off. Just relaxed at home with Mark. It feels strange to not be constantly worrying, but also wonderful. This is what I've worked for."},
  {"entry_number": 71, "date": "2025-12-30", "content": "New Year's Eve bookings are fantastic. The restaurant is doing well. Financial stress is significantly reduced. This gives me real hope for the future, for us."},
  {"entry_number": 72, "date": "2026-01-02", "content": "Therapy today. Discussed how to maintain this healthier mindset. It's not about being 'cured,' but about having tools to navigate life's inevitable ups and downs gracefully."},
  {"entry_number": 73, "date": "2026-01-05", "content": "January is usually slow, but we've had a decent start. Trying a new "healthy eating" promotion. Being proactive makes me feel more in control, less anxious."},
  {"entry_number": 74, "date": "2026-01-08", "content": "Mark and I are looking at a small investment property. A big step, shows we're planning a future together, beyond just the restaurant. It feels exciting."},
  {"entry_number": 75, "date": "2026-01-11", "content": "One of my best employees gave notice today. Disappointing, but not a crisis. I can handle it. This time, I feel equipped to find a good replacement."},
  {"entry_number": 76, "date": "2026-01-14", "content": "Interviewed a promising new chef today. Feeling positive about the future team. This isn't just about surviving anymore; it's about building and growing. Less fear now."},
  {"entry_number": 77, "date": "2026-01-17", "content": "Therapy session. Focused on long-term resilience. I'm learning to accept that some things are out of my control. It's about adapting, not just surviving. Feeling more grounded."},
  {"entry_number": 78, "date": "2026-01-20", "content": "Mark and I had a long talk about our communication. We're still working on it, but we're both committed. Our marriage feels stronger, more honest now."},
  {"entry_number": 79, "date": "2026-01-23", "content": "The restaurant isn't booming, but it's stable. I'm learning to find peace in that. Not every day needs to be a battle. Still have worries, but they feel less consuming."},
  {"entry_number": 80, "date": "2026-01-26", "content": "Spent the afternoon volunteering at a local food bank. It felt good to give back to the community. A nice change of pace from restaurant demands."},
  {"entry_number": 81, "date": "2026-01-29", "content": "Financial review shows we're on solid ground. Not rich, but solvent and growing. A huge relief after all the worry. This is what success feels like."},
  {"entry_number": 82, "date": "2026-02-01", "content": "Therapy today. Reflected on how much my relationship with fear of failure has changed. It's still there, but I'm not letting it dictate my every move anymore."},
  {"entry_number": 83, "date": "2026-02-04", "content": "Mark booked us a spontaneous dinner reservation at a new place. A little luxury. It's nice to enjoy simple pleasures without guilt or worry. We deserve it."},
  {"entry_number": 84, "date": "2026-02-07", "content": "Implemented a new marketing idea – online local ads. Already seeing a small uptick in weekend reservations. Small steps make a difference. Feels good to see results."},
  {"entry_number": 85, "date": "2026-02-10", "content": "Had a small kitchen mishap today, but handled it calmly and efficiently. No panic. It shows how far I've come in managing stress. Proud of that growth."},
  {"entry_number": 86, "date": "2026-02-13", "content": "Valentine's Day bookings are great. Another busy, profitable weekend ahead. The restaurant feels alive and well. It's a wonderful feeling after all the struggle."},
  {"entry_number": 87, "date": "2026-02-16", "content": "Therapy session. Talked about setting new goals for personal growth and for the restaurant. It's about moving forward, not just recovering from past struggles. Optimistic."},
  {"entry_number": 88, "date": "2026-02-19", "content": "Mark and I actually had a real conversation about our future plans. It was tough but necessary. We're both committed to working on things, even if it's slow progress."},
  {"entry_number": 89, "date": "2026-02-22", "content": "Cleaned the kitchen thoroughly today. It's a small thing, but it helps me clear my head. Thinking about the journey. It's been tough, but I'm still here, thriving."},
  {"entry_number": 90, "date": "2026-02-25", "content": "Explored options for expanding the outdoor seating area. It's a significant investment, but I feel confident in the business's potential now. A new level of dreaming."},
  {"entry_number": 91, "date": "2026-02-28", "content": "Had a fantastic dinner with Mark and some friends tonight. I felt present and engaged, not distracted by restaurant worries. It was a truly enjoyable evening."},
  {"entry_number": 92, "date": "2026-03-02", "content": "Therapy today. Discussed how to maintain this progress and continue evolving. It's not about being 'fixed,' but about building a more resilient, fulfilling life. I'm learning."},
  {"entry_number": 93, "date": "2026-03-05", "content": "Spring menu planning is underway. I'm genuinely excited about creating new dishes. It feels like a passion project again, not just a desperate attempt to survive."},
  {"entry_number": 94, "date": "2026-03-08", "content": "Mark and I started planning our short vacation. It's a real trip, not just a day off. This feels like a huge milestone for our relationship and my mental health."},
  {"entry_number": 95, "date": "2026-03-11", "content": "Received a positive review from a food critic today. A wonderful surprise! It validates all the hard work and reaffirms my passion. Feeling incredibly proud."},
  {"entry_number": 96, "date": "2026-03-14", "content": "Had a great team meeting today. Everyone is engaged and positive. It's amazing what a difference a healthy work environment makes. I value them so much."},
  {"entry_number": 97, "date": "2026-03-17", "content": "Therapy session. Reflected on my journey. I'm not the same person who started therapy. I have agency, I have hope, and I have a stronger marriage. Grateful."},
  {"entry_number": 98, "date": "2026-03-20", "content": "Mark and I spent the evening making plans for the garden. Simple, domestic things. It's these quiet moments that truly make life worth living, beyond the restaurant's success."},
  {"entry_number": 99, "date": "2026-03-23", "content": "The restaurant is stable, my marriage is strong, and I feel more at peace. It's not perfect, but I've learned to navigate the challenges. I am resilient."},
  {"entry_number": 100, "date": "2026-03-26", "content": "Last therapy session today. I'm continuing to grow. The journey never ends, but I have the tools now. Feeling hopeful, present, and ready for whatever comes next."}
```
